description: Sum of 5th powers of odd divisors of n.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Odd Divisor Function
formula: Dirichlet g.f. (1-2^(5-s))*zeta(s)*zeta(s-5). - R. J. Mathar, Apr 06 2011
mathematica: a[n_] := Select[ Divisors[n], OddQ]^5 // Total; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 34}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 25 2012 *)
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
